metadata.description: Open CEO plugin marketplace - tools for VC-backed startup CEOs

plugins.name: metrics
plugins.description: Startup metrics toolkit for CEOs. Track, calculate, and benchmark SaaS and marketplace metrics. Integrates with fundraising, board-prep, and investor-updates plugins.

plugins.name: fundraising
plugins.description: Fundraising toolkit for VC-backed startup CEOs. Create pitch decks, manage investor outreach, analyze term sheets, and track pipeline.

plugins.name: board-prep
plugins.description: Board meeting preparation toolkit for VC-backed startup CEOs. Helps create agendas, draft board decks, prepare metrics, and anticipate investor questions.

plugins.name: investor-updates
plugins.description: Monthly investor update toolkit for VC-backed startup CEOs. Helps draft professional investor emails, generate metrics snapshots, and follow communication best practices.

plugins.name: hiring
plugins.description: Startup hiring toolkit for CEOs. Generate job descriptions, interview scorecards, offer letters, and calculate equity compensation. Includes salary and equity benchmarks by role, level, and stage.
